## Background

I'm a second-year Master's student at UChicago studying Computational and Applied Mathematics. Prior to UChicago, I attended Southern Methodist University from 2019-2023, where I received a BBA in Finance and a minor in Computer Science. You can view my resume [here](images/Nahley_resume_10_1.pdf).

## Research

I'm currently studying long-distance wave propagation through turbulent media with [Prof. Anjali Nair](https://stat.uchicago.edu/people/profile/anjali-nair/).
